ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Community_Treatment_Order_Level_1', NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Entered__c)) , OR(Date_Entered__c> TODAY(), Date_Entered__c < Commencement_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Date Entered of Make Order should be less than future date and greater than Commencement Date.
